instructions:
Score the eggplant slices with a fork and sprinkle with salt. Strain in a colander for about 30 minutes,
rinse and pat dry. Lay out the eggplant and zucchini slices on a rimed baking pan. Combine the olive and
peanut oil and drizzle 2 tbsp over the zucchini and eggplant slices. Place in a 350 F oven for about 12 to 15
minutes or until soft.
Sauté the sliced onion and green pepper in the remaining oil in a 4 quart pot for about 20 minutes. Cut
eggplant slices in quarters and add remaining ingredients.
Simmer for an hour covered. Serves 8.
name: Ratatouille
